resources.string: This album is empty, choose a new one.
Error when loading %1$s. The programmer of this application sucks: %2$s
You are reviewing images with pending changes. Confirm changes in the menu..
Stop reviewing changes. Back to album.
You are now viewing the full album
You are about to apply ALL pending changes. The images marked for deletion will be gone. Forever. There is no going back. Are you really sure?
Compress this image to save space
"About to apply all pending operations in album "

Welcome to Tripping Photo Manager - https://github.com/nicolasbrailo/TrippingSdCardPhotoManager


Review your pictures by swiping. If there is a picture you don't like mark it for deletion using the action bar above. It won't be deleted until you confirm.


When you are done, delete all the unwanted pictures at once: select the option "Review and apply changes…" from the action bar. Once in review mode, you can review the pending operations. When ready, go once more to the menu and select the option "Apply all pending changes".


Tripping Photo Manager can also compress photos. Using a 90% compression usually results in no visible quality difference, even at 100% zoom. Mark the pictures you want to compress with the button in the action bar.


Tripping Photo Manager bundles ImageMagick: any action that you can do with "mogrify" can also be done with Tripping Photo Manager.


This is an open source project. Go to https://github.com/nicolasbrailo/TrippingSdCardPhotoManager to request features or just to check out the source code.

You are in review mode: review all the changes you have selected, then in the action bar select the "Apply all pending changes" option.


Remember that deleting pictures can never be undone.


More info? Go to https://github.com/nicolasbrailo/TrippingSdCardPhotoManager
Will copy all the pictures to a local storage in your device. This may take a long time.
Renaming this album failed. Are you sure you have permissions to do so?
